Html:
Hi all,

nowadays I am mainly linux based, which leaves me 2 options, use microsoft office through wine (not really great) or use openoffice. Now I have really refined my style for University of Birmingham and dont want to have to do all the work again. Does anyone know of a way of using these xsl styles in openoffice? Maybe through some external referencing software maybe?

Thanks for anyone's help!

Roob
